document.full_text: an egyptian criminal court sentenced a police officer to death in absentia sunday for killing protesters, the first such ruling to be passed since pro-democracy demonstrators ousted hosni mubarak on february 11.
document.title: egypt sentences policeman to die for protest deaths
lines_and_colors: an egyptian criminal court sentenced a police officer to death in absentia sunday for killing protesters, the first such ruling to be passed since pro-democracy demonstrators ousted hosni mubarak on february 11.
